briefTitle: Study to Investigate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of SER120 Nasal Spray in Elderly Patients With Nocturia
officialTitle: A Phase III Randomized, Open-Label, Multicenter Study to Investigate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of SER120 Nasal Spray Formulations in Elderly Patients (â‰¥ 75 Years Old) With Nocturia
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if SER120 nasal spray is well tolerated in 75 years or older nocturic patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Serum Sodium Levels at Baseline and During Treatment
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: baseline, Day 4, Day 8, Day 15, Day 22, Day 29, Day 43 and Day 57
